SqlQueries.TicketsByDocNumber: SELECT * FROM data_all WHERE passenger_document_number = {0} ORDER BY time, ticket_number, depart_datetime, type
SqlQueries.TicketOperations: SELECT * FROM data_all WHERE ticket_number = {0} ORDER BY time, ticket_number, depart_datetime, type
SqlQueries.AllTicketsByTicketNumber: SELECT * FROM data_all WHERE passenger_document_number = (SELECT passenger_document_number FROM data_all WHERE ticket_number = {0} LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY time, ticket_number, depart_datetime, type
